item.title: Created a Legal Chatbot for a Hackathon: A Journey in AI and Law
item.description: Introduction At a recent 24-hour hackathon, my team and I took on the challenge of creating a legal chatbot to provide simple and informative information related to legal queries and questions related to crime in India. In this blog post, I’ll walk you through our journey of developing this chatbot, the tools and technologies we used, and the lessons we learned along the way. Background The hackathon, held in Chandigarh, gathered teams of developers, designers, and innovators to tackle real-world problems in a limited timeframe.
